NK101(de)003:1: // rat+na ta da pa r+ya su tra bi ha ra ti sma ///
NK101(de)003:2: rin po che gter gtad pa bzhugs so //
NK101(de)003:6: gnas lugs rtogs pa'i ngang la yon tan rin po che gter gtad pa mdo bsdus pa /
NK101(de)003:7: dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK101(de)003:8: gnas lugs yul med rang snang du gnas pa yin
NK101(de)003:9: mod kyang mi mthun pa de nyid mtshon pa'i brda
NK101(de)003:10: dang mtshon bya rtogs pa'i don dang bral bas ma
NK101(de)003:11: rig lhan cing / bdag tu kun rtog pa'i mthus
NK101(de)003:12: gzhan snang ste rang gzhan gnyis su grub de'i cha
NK101(de)003:13: las zhen pa nyon mongs pa lnga byung zhing des
NK101(de)003:14: kun slob byas pa'i 'du byed sems dpa'i ngo bo
NK101(de)003:15: yang srid 'phen cing g.yo bas rlung ste las gsum
NK101(de)003:16: spyad pas des 'khor ba'i dngos po ris drug smin
NK101(de)003:17: rig lhan cing / pa'o // rtogs pa'i rgyu'i rkyen
NK101(de)003:18: lhun gnas bde chen lung spyi man ngag rigs sam
NK101(de)003:19: khyad thug phrad gsum gyis ngo shes nas //
NK101(de)003:20: de'i don la 'dris shing goms nas ngan song dang
NK101(de)003:21: theg dman du ldog pa med de duhkha rtsol ba'i
NK101(de)003:23: sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan mngon shes 'bras
NK101(de)003:24: bu lnga mtshan dpe ye shes 'gro don rnams de'i
NK101(de)003:25: shugs las ma btsal bar 'char ba'o //
NK101(de)003:26: des na rang gi sems nyid yon tan mi zad
NK101(de)003:27: pas gter gang chen 1 po de rang la gnas
NK101(de)003:28: gang la 1par // chos nyid rtogs pa la mi
NK101(de)003:29: slu bas tshad ma gang ltar lung man ngag rigs
NK101(de)003:30: pa gsum dang ldan par 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la
NK101(de)003:32: dper na klu'i rgyal po spyi gtsug gi rgyan rin
NK101(de)003:33: po che la dgos pa thams cad tshang yang klu
NK101(de)003:34: / gdug pas dbang du byas pas 'gro ba'i dbul ba ma sel te /
NK101(de)003:35: rgyal bu dge don gyis bsod nams bsags pa'i lo
NK101(de)003:36: rgyus sbyar dbang gis thob pa'i rin po che de
NK101(de)003:37: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas mchod pas
NK101(de)003:38: 'dod pa'i yon tan char du phab nas /
NK101(de)003:39: des 'gro ba'i dbul ba bsal te 'dod pa'i bde ba la longs spyad pa ltar du //
NK101(de)003:40: ye nas rang la lhun gyis grub par gnas pas
NK101(de)003:41: rtsol ba'i duhkha med pa'i bde ba chen po de
NK101(de)003:42: // ma rtogs shing phyin ci log tu brtags pas
NK101(de)003:43: bag chags kyi rnyog pas lhun gnas de bsgribs pa
NK101(de)003:44: // la / lha'i dbang po yis phyogs bcu'i sangs
NK101(de)003:45: rgyas bskul ba'i drin gyis phyag na rdo rjes lhun
NK101(de)003:47: de la goms shing 'dris pas bag chags kyi rnyog
NK101(de)003:48: gzhi sangs te rnam byang rgya mtsho dwangs ba la
NK101(de)003:49: sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan gyi gzugs brnyan
NK101(de)003:50: rang shar // ba ni rtsol bas bsgrubs pa'i theg
NK101(de)003:51: pa gzhan dang mtshungs pa med pa'i rtsol med kyi
NK101(de)003:52: bde ba chen po rang la shar to //
NK101(de)003:53: dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa'i rtogs pa'i ye shes dang //
NK101(de)003:54: 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems nyid ma nor bar yul med rang snang ba dang //
NK101(de)003:55: bla ma'i drin gyis thob pa'i gnas lugs ngo shes
NK101(de)003:56: ba'i rig ba yul med rang shar ba dang gsum
NK101(de)003:57: po de / rang bzhin ye nas dbyer med pa ni /
NK101(de)003:58: dper na ming dbyibs las tha dad kyang ngo bo gser du gcig pa bzhin no //
NK101(de)003:59: 'khrul pas brtags zhen phyi snang ba las ye nas
NK101(de)003:60: dben pa ni sems kyi rang bzhin spros bral lhun
NK101(de)003:61: grub gyis // smag gi mun rum ltar du brtags
NK101(de)003:62: zhen cir yang ma dmigs pas ther zug rtag pa
NK101(de)003:63: grub gyis // las grol lo // gzung 'dzin gnyis
NK101(de)003:64: su snang ba'i dus nyid na sems kyi mtshan nyid
NK101(de)003:66: ye nas gnyis snang mi gnas par rang gsal ba ni nyi ma'i snying po dang 'dra 'o //
NK101(de)003:67: ye shes rol pa'i rang snang rnam pa sgyu ma lhun grub kyis ma 'gags pa 'char te //
NK101(de)003:68: stong pa phyang chad ma yin pa ni chu nyid rlabs su shar ba dang 'dra'o //
NK101(de)003:69: de ltar rtag chad kyi mtha' gsum las grol ba'i
NK101(de)003:70: dgos pa yod pa'i phyir brdar btags pa yin no
NK101(de)003:72: shes nas rang grol bar bya ba ni skabs 'dir
NK101(de)003:73: re zhig rnam shes tshogs brgyad yod pa las ni
NK101(de)003:74: // kun gzhi gcig la gzhi sbyor gnyis 0su shes par bya te tshogs bdun la skye lugs gsum //
NK101(de)003:75: du bstan te cis na gzhi don gyi kun gzhi
NK101(de)003:76: rnam byang dang bar gnas pa de tshogs bdun bag
NK101(de)003:77: chags kyi rnyog pas bslad pas sbyor don dang gnyis
NK101(de)003:78: so // tshogs bdun gyis gzhi don ma spangs kyang bral bar snang bas skye lugs gsum du shar //
NK101(de)003:79: des na rnam shes tshogs bdun la gsal bar myong ba skye lugs gsum gyis bstan to //
NK101(de)003:80: de'i brda yang na yang rgya gar 'khrul pa shar ba'i phyogs mang bas b+ha g+ha lar //
NK101(de)003:81: mkhar chen ni zag bcas kyi phung po'am lus te
NK101(de)003:82: de la sgo don dbang po drug sogs lhan cig
NK101(de)003:83: 'byung ba'i gnas brgyad du go ste nyer spyod skye
NK101(de)003:85: brgyad phyi sgo lnga bar nang gnam sgo gcig ldan pa'i nang na //
NK101(de)003:86: lta ba phyir du don dang sems can la lta
NK101(de)003:87: zhing gnas pa nang na mi 'gyur bar gnas pa'i
NK101(de)003:88: rgyal po chen po gcig ni kun gzhi ste gzhi
NK101(de)003:90: de la 'khor sems byung ni nyon mongs rnam rtog
NK101(de)003:91: gi grangs med nang na sgo srung rnam shes tshogs
NK101(de)003:92: brgyad // sgo gtan mtshan mar 'dzin pa spros pa
NK101(de)003:93: sna tshogs nga bdag tu 'dzin pa gsum dang gnas
NK101(de)003:95: yod rgyal po de shin tu dbang ni chen nor
NK101(de)003:96: bu ma bral bzhin du kun mi nub pa'i rgyal
NK101(de)003:97: mtshan ma bsgyel bzhin du gcog pas 'gro ba dbul
NK101(de)003:98: bar byed pas // rtogs pa'i gdeng chen po dang
NK101(de)003:99: ldan pa'i de dag gi g.yul 'joms pa'i dpa' bo
NK101(de)003:101: rnam rtog nub pa'i phyogs gong na med cing mdzes pas u rgyan thor cog can gyi gnas na /
NK101(de)003:102: 'jug sgo theg pa brgyad lam stegs su ldan pa'i
NK101(de)003:103: khri sngon du rdzogs par bshams nas rtsa ba rig
NK101(de)003:104: par gcig la gang gis kyang gong ma chod pa'i
NK101(de)003:105: rtse mo thug phrad gsum ni shes pa gsum sgrol
NK101(de)003:106: bas mtshon cha skye lugs gsum po rang lhun grub
NK101(de)003:107: gsum du 'bar bar byed bas 'od de des /
NK101(de)003:109: rang bsgral rang bcag phyags mas btab pa rnams byas nas //
NK101(de)003:110: 'khor sems dang sems byung rnams rgyal po kun gzhi nyid la bsdus pas sbyor don rang grol bas //
NK101(de)003:111: phyi ru don dang sems can la bltar med nang
NK101(de)003:112: gzhi don dus gsum du mi 'gyur bar gnas pa
NK101(de)003:113: nyid // nor bu la longs spyad cing mi nub
NK101(de)003:114: pa'i rgyal mtshan gzugs pa'i dgos pa yod pa'i yang
NK101(de)003:115: nyid // phyir ro // rin po che gter gtad
NK101(de)003:116: pa las gnas lugs bde chen gyi le'u ste dang
NK101(de)003:117: po'o////rgyu rkyen byed pa med pas rang byung gi ye
NK101(de)003:118: shes lnga ru rtag tu rang snang ba yin pa
NK101(de)003:119: la ma rig ste cis na /
NK101(de)003:120: rin chen lta bu'i gdams ngag gi rkyen med pas na ma rig /
NK101(de)003:121: gang du na rang byung ye shes nyid du ma rig pa ste lhan skyes zhes bya //
NK101(de)003:122: des nga bdag tu 'dzin kun brtags kyi ma rig
NK101(de)003:123: pa mdud pa dgrol dkar bas dam par mthas pa
NK101(de)003:124: de'i / mthu las gzhan du snang de gnyis kyi cha las 'dzin pa nyon mongs pa lngar smin //
NK101(de)003:125: nang na sa bon nyon mongs pa dug lnga gnas pa des //
NK101(de)003:126: kun nas bslangs pa'i 'du byed las dge mi dge
NK101(de)003:127: mi g.yo ba yang na lus ngag yid gsum gyi
NK101(de)003:129: re zhig gi 'bras bu 'gro ba ris drug las gsum las grub pa'o //
NK101(de)003:130: yin lugs chos nyid rang bzhin gyi snang ba yin mod kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa'i //
NK101(de)003:131: mthu can gyi bsgo gzhi de la sgod byed kyis
NK101(de)003:132: bzhag pa'i las nyon mongs kyi sa bon la sogs
NK101(de)003:133: pa bgas kyis chos nyid 'dus ma byas la bgas
NK101(de)003:134: chags sgod par bshad mi gsung ngo /
NK101(de)003:135: chags pa ni dpe na ras dkar po gur du phub pa la //
NK101(de)003:136: dri ma bgas kyis chags pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
NK101(de)003:137: zag bcas kyi las gsum gyis g.yo bas rlung drag po ste de nus pa'i mthu che bas //
NK101(de)003:138: zhen pa 'gro ba rigs drug gi 'khor lo ni
NK101(de)003:139: las kyi shugs kyis yang yang du bskyar bas 'khor
NK101(de)003:140: ba zhe'o // phyi dang nang gi rten 'brel bcu
NK101(de)003:141: gnyis snod bcud la cha phra rags grangs mang nyung
NK101(de)003:143: zo chu'i brgyud pa'i 'khor lo dang 'dra bar rgyun
NK101(de)003:144: mi 'chad cing de dag dbral dkar bar zhes pa'o
NK101(de)003:145: // ston pa dang bstan pa'i rkyen gyis 'khor ba'i
NK101(de)003:146: 'khor lo log pa gsum dang rtsol ba theg pa
NK101(de)003:147: // brgyad do // log pa gsum gyis 'khor lo
NK101(de)003:148: yin lugs las phyir la phyin ci log tu bskor
NK101(de)003:150: gnas lugs kyi don lhun grub gsum la rgyab kyis 'phyogs par 'gyur te gang zhe na //
NK101(de)003:151: tshe 'di'i bde sdug sngar gyi dge sdig gi las
NK101(de)003:152: kyi mthu las gyur pa blos ma dpyad de las
NK101(de)003:154: tshe 'di'i ched du mthu dang stobs dang btsan pa
NK101(de)003:155: dang phyug pa bsgrub pa la brtson pa ste 'jig
NK101(de)003:156: rten ba'i gsang tshig la brten pa'i //
NK101(de)003:157: brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa drag po spyod pas log par bgrangs so //
NK101(de)003:158: mos pa can thabs 'dzud bsre ba'i lung gis drang ma mos na btang snyoms su gzhag go //
NK101(de)003:159: snga phyir 'brel ba'i mu med pas phyang chad pa
NK101(de)003:160: ste la las 'dod pa ni snga phyi med par
NK101(de)003:162: de nyid kyang khu khrag dang sa chu me rlung
NK101(de)003:163: 'byung ba bzhi 'dus pa yi nus mthu las mngon
NK101(de)003:164: par sems can gsal mi gsal snod kyi sems pa
NK101(de)003:165: can glo bur du byung gi las 'bras su mi
NK101(de)003:166: 'dod / slar yang 'byung ba'i nus pa zad nas der thim ste //
NK101(de)003:167: lus sems rgyun chad pa na srid par nying mtshams
NK101(de)003:168: sbyor ba med pa ni dpe na me shi nas
NK101(de)003:169: thal ba rlung gis khyer te me'i rgyun 'brel ba
NK101(de)003:170: gzhan skye ba med pa dang 'dra bar 'dod pa
NK101(de)003:171: // 'di dag ni sngon kyang rgyal ba'i bka' yis kyang ma bzlogs pas /
NK101(de)003:172: gting nas byang chub kyi sa bon tshig pa phyogs lhung gi gang zag la //
NK101(de)003:173: log lta la nyon chen po dag yod pa'i bsdigs bskur la btang snyoms su gzhag 1go //
NK101(de)003:174: mos pa can la thabs 'dzud nye du kha len
NK101(de)003:175: byed pa 'dra 1bsre ba ni 'dren mar spyad nas
NK101(de)003:177: blo'am rigs pa spyi sar 'jog pa'i gang zag de la //
NK101(de)003:178: dang po lung las tshe snga phyi dang las 'bras
NK101(de)003:179: bshad pas yod par dpag par 1bya ste mdo sde
NK101(de)003:180: las brgya pa dang skyes rabs drang //
NK101(de)003:181: rmi lam nyams te sems med pa'i gnyid dang brgyal
NK101(de)003:182: ba'i tshe shes pa rgyun chad kyang phyis sngar gyi
NK101(de)003:183: rgyun las 'byung bas tshe phyi ma 'byung bar grub
NK101(de)003:184: bo // rigs pa chos can rang gi rigs 'dra snga ma'i rgyu las 'byung ba yin te dam bca'/
NK101(de)003:185: res 'ga' ba rnams dmigs pa'i phyir myu gu bzhin no //
NK101(de)003:186: zhes 'bras bu'i rtags la sbyar bas rgyu snga ma yod par grub bo //
NK101(de)003:187: snga ma'i rgyu la ma brten par glo bur du
NK101(de)003:188: 'byung zhing res 'ga' bar ma grub ste re zhig
NK101(de)003:190: ldog pa de dag gcod pa'i thal 'gyur rtag tu
NK101(de)003:191: yod pa'am med par thal zhes pa'i rtags su khas
NK101(de)003:192: blangs sbyar la rtag tu yod na rgyud chad nyams
NK101(de)003:193: la / med na 'adi'ang med par 'gyur bya'o //
NK101(de)003:194: la la'i 'dod pas tshe snga phyi tsam yod par 'dod la //
NK101(de)003:195: nges par legs 0pa'i 'bras bu thams cad mkhyen pa
NK101(de)003:196: la med ces skur pa 'debs te ji ltar na
NK101(de)003:197: / de ni 0nyon mongs pa dug gsum las grol bar 'dod par 'dug te //
NK101(de)003:198: nged kyi 'dod pa ni dug gsum sems kyi rang ka bzhin yin pas //
NK101(de)003:199: dug gsum de spangs na sems de dang yang bral bar 'gyur bas na //
NK101(de)003:200: sems med pas dug gsum las grol ba po ni
NK101(de)003:201: gang grol su dper na nag po spangs na sol
NK101(de)003:202: ba med par 'gyur bas dkar por gang gtong zhes
NK101(de)003:203: pa lta bu'o // zhig grol te grol rgyu med /
NK101(de)003:204: dug kha gsum spang du mi 'gyur bar rtag pa
NK101(de)003:205: yin la spong ga ba'i thabs med cing spong thabs
NK101(de)003:206: shes nga pa'ang med la spang du btub ca pa'ang
NK101(de)003:207: min // dug gsum de cha ni ngo bo nyid kyis mi 'gyur bar gnas par 'dod do //
NK101(de)003:208: de yang rigs chad btang snyoms su bzhag pa la sogs pa gsum sngar bshad 111bzhin du mthun la //
NK101(de)003:209: rigs pas sun dbyung ba yang //
NK101(de)003:210: dang po ka ma nges te rnyog chu 'dra bas dwangs su btub /
NK101(de)003:211: gnyis kha pa ma grub ste dug gsum gyi rgyu
NK101(de)003:212: bdag 'dzin dang rkyen gzhan snang dang ldan pas mi
NK101(de)003:213: rtag / gsum ga pa ye shes kyis spong bas
NK101(de)003:214: thabs yod bzhi nga pa bla ma brgyud pa'i gdams
NK101(de)003:216: lnga ca pa ye shes de nyid dug gsum de'i rang bzhin yin pas spang du btub /
NK101(de)003:217: cha tha ma dug gsum 'gyur ba rang rig mngon
NK101(de)003:218: sum gyis grub pas ngo bo nyid kyis mi gnas
NK101(de)003:219: so mo // slob dpon shes rab 'byung gnas kyis /
NK101(de)003:220: gang gzhan la 'chad pa la don dang mthun zhing
NK101(de)003:221: 'gal ba med pa des gzhal bya de mngon sum
NK101(de)003:223: rang rang gis yul dpyad pa bzhin /
NK101(de)003:224: gzhung 'bum la sogs pa 'chad pa po des kyang /
NK101(de)003:225: don dang mthun zhing 'gal ba med do //
NK101(de)003:226: zhes bya bas sgrub par nus so //
NK101(de)003:228: ngag gi spu ris zin na 'gal ba med do //
NK101(de)003:230: la la'i 'dod pas rgyal ba'i lung bral phyogs tsam la brten nas //
NK101(de)003:231: chos thams cad ci yang ma yin pa la //
NK101(de)003:232: ci yang ma yin pa rang yang ma yin par 'dod de khas len spangs pa'o //
NK101(de)003:233: grub mtha' 'di ni bsgyur ba dka' 'byung ba'i nyen che la //
NK101(de)003:234: 'bras bu sangs rgyas thob pa la /
NK101(de)003:235: slu bar byed pas lam gyi gzugs brnyan tsam yin la yang dag pa'i lam min pas kho'i //
NK101(de)003:236: 'dod pa de las bzlog pa tsam du ci yang yin par khas len bya'o //
NK101(de)003:237: mu stegs rtag pa ther zug tu 'dod pa dag
NK101(de)003:238: rigs mi 'dra ba bzhir gnas te gang zhe na
NK101(de)003:239: // rig pa gzung 'dzin las grol ba //
NK101(de)003:240: rtag gcig bde ba rang dbang can //
NK101(de)003:241: bdag la gzugs med pas dngos po yod 1pa bdag
NK101(de)003:242: ni yod pas med pa las 1grol ba tsam du
NK101(de)003:243: / gnas pas blang ba dang dor ba dang bral bar 'dod do //
NK101(de)003:244: ldog pa bems po log pa dang bcas pa'i rig pa de la //
NK101(de)003:245: nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bcas par 'dod pa de las //
NK101(de)003:246: blang dor gnyis dang bral ba'i dngos por las grol te min par smra na /
NK101(de)003:247: so so skye bo'ang byang chub de 'thad 'gyur //
NK101(de)003:248: ther zug la la'i 'dod pas snod bcud thams cad
NK101(de)003:249: rdul phra rab 'dus pa las grub par 'dod de
NK101(de)003:250: / de yang rdul gnyis bar med par 'byar ba la rdzas /
NK101(de)003:251: rdzas gnyis 'byar ba la rdzas gzhan zhes bya /
NK101(de)003:252: phran ni rdul rtag la rags pa yan lag can rtag pa min te //
NK101(de)003:253: snying gi dkyil na sems can thams cad la bdag
NK101(de)003:254: ces bya ba byed pa po rang dbang thob pa
NK101(de)003:255: de dag kyang rdul las grub pa shes sbyangs pa
NK101(de)003:256: 'dra ba la sogs par 'dod gzhan yang tshig drug
NK101(de)003:258: rdul phra mo phrad ma phrad bltas ma bltas ring
NK101(de)003:259: thung gi phyogs chas gzhig pas cha med kyi rdzas
NK101(de)003:260: ma grub pas // yon tan la sogs las spyi
NK101(de)003:261: bye brag 'du ba rnams kyi tha snyad spangs pa
NK101(de)003:262: ste don la yang rdzas su ma grub bo //
NK101(de)003:263: la las yon tan rdul mun pa snying stobs gsum
NK101(de)003:264: gyi rang bzhin cha mnyam pa ni gtso bo ste
NK101(de)003:265: de rtag par 'dod la rgyu'i dus 'bras bu gnas
NK101(de)003:266: pa'am yin par rdzogs par 'dod pa //
NK101(de)003:267: de la sgrub byed kyi tshad ma yod pa min la //
NK101(de)003:268: dug gsum gyi rang bzhin ni mi rtag ste rgyu
NK101(de)003:269: yod par ni sngar chad lta'i skabs su bshad pa
NK101(de)003:270: nyid do // rgyu yin pa ru khas blangs nas 'bras bu rdzogs par brjod pa ni /
NK101(de)003:271: rang tshig gis rang gi 'dod pa bsal ba yin pas na blun po'i ngag tu rig par bya'o //
NK101(de)003:272: kha cig gi 'dod pas rdzas gcig nyid kun gyi dngos gzhi can la /
NK101(de)003:273: nges par 'dod pas bcings par smra ba mu stegs kyi lta ba sum brgya drug cu gsum po /
NK101(de)003:274: las grol ba khyu mchog gi mdog ris ltar //
NK101(de)003:275: rtogs nas spyod pa log pa'i spyod pa me lnga
NK101(de)003:276: bsten pa la sogs pa spyad pas sngar gyi sdig
NK101(de)003:278: las dang rtog mthun gyi snang ba'i rdzas gcig nyid rdzas kun gyi dngos gzhi min te /
NK101(de)003:279: zhes dbang po'i mngon sum tshad mas kho'i 'dod pa bsal ba dang //
NK101(de)003:280: gzhan yang sgrub byed kyi tshad ma ma grub pa'o //
NK101(de)003:281: dbang phyug gis thams cad kyi rgyu med pas byed par 'dod pa'i tha snyad spangs pa'o //
NK101(de)003:282: rang bzhin spros bral nyams 'thad nges //
NK101(de)003:283: blo dang mos pa'i rim pas so so'i 'jug pa'i sgo theg pa brgyad kyi 'khor lo de la /
NK101(de)003:284: spang bya dang gnyen po lhan cig mi gnas pa'i
NK101(de)003:285: 'gal bas gang zag gi bdag gzung ba gnyis ka'i
NK101(de)003:286: chos kyi bdag spong ba nyan rang byang sems gsum
NK101(de)003:287: dang bdag gcig pa'i 'brel ba'i stobs kyis sgrub pa
NK101(de)003:288: sngags sde lnga'o // 'gal spong gsum gyi dang po
NK101(de)003:289: sangs rgyas kyi bka' yi gzhi 'dzin pa ni nyan
NK101(de)003:291: 'gro ba rigs drug dang log pa gsum gyi zhen
NK101(de)003:292: brtags kyi snang ba las log pa yin ste gang
NK101(de)003:293: zhe na / so so skye bo dang mu stegs kyi gang zag gi bdag mi gnas pas so //
NK101(de)003:294: chos kyi bdag tsam lhag cing 'gog pa rdzas su yod par lta ba ni //
NK101(de)003:295: phyi gzung bar bya ba'i yul phra 2rab don dam rdul 1du 3grub la /
NK101(de)003:296: nang 'dzin pa'i shes pa skad cig ma ni don dam du 'dod de /
NK101(de)003:297: de dag bcom gzhig gi mig nod pas so //
NK101(de)003:298: lam 'phags pa'i bden pa duhkha kun 'byung 'gog pa
NK101(de)003:299: lam bzhi la nges par brten nas 'bras bu sgrub
NK101(de)003:300: pa can // rdul phra mo phyogs chas gzhig ste
NK101(de)003:301: gzung ba ma grub pas de 'dzin pa'i yan lag
NK101(de)003:302: sems dang sems byung skad cig ma'ang spangs pa'o //
NK101(de)003:303: nyan thos de la brten nas byung ba dge bshes la mi ltos pas rang shes can te /
NK101(de)003:304: des phyi nang gi rten 'brel sgyu ma mig yor ltar rtogs pa la brten pas //
NK101(de)003:305: gzung yul gzugs chos bco lnga la gcig rig byed
NK101(de)003:306: min pa las gzhan bcu bzhi rten 'brel du rtogs
NK101(de)003:307: te rdul phran du ma grub pa can la /
NK101(de)003:308: nang 'dzin pa'i yan lag sems dang sems byung skad cig mar bden cing nges par lta ba'o //
NK101(de)003:309: gzung ba'i yul bden par yod pa min kyang 'dzin pa de nges par yod par lta na //
NK101(de)003:310: yul med pas shes pa de gang la nges par
NK101(de)003:311: 'dzin te dper na gdung chad pa'i sras bzhin du
NK101(de)003:312: / rigs pas 'thad pa'i 'dzin pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
NK101(de)003:313: lta ba bdag med dang spyod pa gzhan don nar
NK101(de)003:314: son pa'i theg pa chen po yis gzung ba rdul
NK101(de)003:315: dang 'dzin pa skad cig ma chos kyi bdag kyang
NK101(de)003:317: snang ba'i dngos po rnam pa la rtag pa dang bde pas stong pa ni /
NK101(de)003:318: kun rdzob kyi bden pa yin la //
NK101(de)003:319: don dam par spros pa thams cad yongs su zhi
NK101(de)003:320: ba dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yang ma
NK101(de)003:321: grub par 'dod la de gang gis phye na yul
NK101(de)003:322: can / blo 'khrul ma 'khrul dang yul dngos po
NK101(de)003:323: dang des stong pas rnam pa gnyis su phye ba'o
NK101(de)003:324: can / // dngos po rnams don dam par rang bzhin med par bden na //
NK101(de)003:325: blos brtags 'khrul pa'i yul kun rdzob sa lam phar phyin rnams brten bas ci zhig bya //
NK101(de)003:326: 'khrul pa yin kyang yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyis
NK101(de)003:327: 'bras bu thob pa'i don byed nus pas dang du
NK101(de)003:328: blang bya yin ce ka na //
NK101(de)003:329: smig rgyus kyang skom pa sel ba'i don byed nus par thal kha 'o na go yis //
NK101(de)003:330: don dam pa'i bden pa shes bya'i gshis rang bzhin med pas na //
NK101(de)003:331: stong pa phyang chad kyi lta ba song ba de
NK101(de)003:332: kun rdzob 'khrul pas chad lta de las bzlog tu
NK101(de)003:333: btub pa zhig gam ci yin //
NK101(de)003:334: grub pa'i mis gru'i thag pa la lag pas zin pas na /
NK101(de)003:335: gru zhig pas mi 'jigs so zer ba ltar 'dir
NK101(de)003:336: yang kun brtags las grol na chad ltas mi 'jigs
NK101(de)003:338: gdod nas dngos po yod par ma grub par 'dod
NK101(de)003:339: pa ye nas stong pas chad par mi 'gyur zhe
NK101(de)003:341: stong pa phyang chad min na gzhan gyi gtan tshigs cis phyang chad yin te khyad med do //
NK101(de)003:342: sngar yod phyis med chad lta yin la //
NK101(de)003:343: 'brel pas sgrub pa lnga la bsgyur te sgrub pa ni phyi pa gsum mo //
NK101(de)003:344: de'i dang po kri ya pa'i 'dod pa la //
NK101(de)003:345: kun rdzob tu mtho 'jam rtsub pa la sogs pa'i
NK101(de)003:346: snang ba rnams de pad rdo rje'i rigs gsum gyi
NK101(de)003:347: lha'i dal ye shes pa dang dam tshig pa tha
NK101(de)003:348: dad bzang ngan rje bo dang 'bangs 'dra spyod pa
NK101(de)003:349: dang rdzas gtsang mas 'bras bu grub //
NK101(de)003:350: don dam du mtha' bzhi'i dri ma dag pa'i chos nyid du 'dod do //
NK101(de)003:351: don dam dag par bden pa la spyod pa khrus
NK101(de)003:352: dang gtsang spra bya dgos pas lta spyod 'khrul pa
NK101(de)003:353: yin no // khye bel ltar lta spyod ma nges
NK101(de)003:354: pa'i u pa ya'i 'dod pas don dam par stong
NK101(de)003:356: kun rdzob tu snang ba rnams yul yul can nam
NK101(de)003:357: bya byed gang rung bsdus pa'i rigs bzhi lha'i dal
NK101(de)003:358: ye shes pa dam tshig pa dpon g.yog gi tshul
NK101(de)003:359: du tha dad bzang ngan du lta /
NK101(de)003:360: kri ya ba ltar las dang bya ba dang yo
NK101(de)003:361: ga ba ltar ting nge 'dzin dang gnyis kyis mthu
NK101(de)003:363: snga ma kri ya ba dang phyi ma yo ga
NK101(de)003:364: ba gnyis kyi lta spyod la skyon brjod pa'i rjes
NK101(de)003:366: rnal 'byor pa'i lta ba ni kun rdzob snang ba'i rnam pa 'di //
NK101(de)003:367: rigs lnga lha'i dal du gsal na ye shes pa
NK101(de)003:368: dang dam tshig pa grogs pa'i tshul du tha dad
NK101(de)003:369: bzang ngan mnyam pa lta la /
NK101(de)003:370: don dam par rnam par snang mdzad chen po stong par rtogs nas /
NK101(de)003:371: bsam gtan gyi yan lag stong zla gsung thugs sku lnga dang /
NK101(de)003:372: dbang byin ting mchod bzhi ste dgu dang ldan pa'i
NK101(de)003:373: sgo nas lha bsgoms pas 'bras bu stug po bkod
NK101(de)003:375: don dam pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po la phyogs ris med pa yin na //
NK101(de)003:376: dgongs rgyud tha dad la rigs lnga phyogs ris dang bcas pa yin nam ci //
NK101(de)003:377: bden gnyis res 'jog gi bsam gtan gyis 'bras bu gcig sgrub par 'dod pa ni /
NK101(de)003:378: dper na tsha reg dang grang reg gi nus pa gcig tu bsdus nas //
NK101(de)003:379: btso bsreg phyogs gcig sgrub par 'dod pa'i blun po dang 'dra'o //
NK101(de)003:380: rang gi sems las phyi rol nas ye shes las
NK101(de)003:381: bsgrub bya'i don dngos grub len te nang nas min
NK101(de)003:382: pas phyi pa / spyod pa dam rdzas la mi
NK101(de)003:383: spyod dam tshig mnyam pa mi srun pa la sogs
NK101(de)003:384: pas nang min de tsam la phyi par 'dod //
NK101(de)003:385: nang pa dbang sgyur thabs kyi theg pa la gnyis kyi rnal 'byor chen po ba //
NK101(de)003:386: lta bas snang stong zung 'jug gi don de gsal bar rtogs na //
NK101(de)003:387: bsgom pa cho ga lnga sngags kyi yan lag lngas bskyed pa'i rtsol ba gtsor byas pas //
NK101(de)003:388: rdzogs pa'i rim pa mi rtog pa'i don la ngang gis 'jug go //
NK101(de)003:389: de yang lta ba dbyer med du 'dod pa dang bcas sgom pa bskyed rdzogs kyi rtsol ba can //
NK101(de)003:390: phyogs med kyi ngang du gnas par 'dod kyang de'i don dang 'gal lo //
NK101(de)003:391: rjes su rnal 'byor gyi 'dod pa ni yul du snang ba chos kyi dbyings la /
NK101(de)003:392: rig pa ye shes de gnyis 'du ba dang 'bral ba med cing /
NK101(de)003:393: ma h+aa'i gnyis med du 'dzin pa de las grol nas bde chen gyi sku ru 'dod la /
NK101(de)003:394: rgyu ni snang ba rnams dbyings su bsgom pa la /
NK101(de)003:395: 'bras bu ni dran rtog ye shes nyid du 'char //
NK101(de)003:396: spyod pa dam tshig la sogs pa'i rkyen la rag ma las par 'dod do //
NK101(de)003:397: de yang lta ba bde chen gyi phyogs ris dang
NK101(de)003:398: bcas sgom pa rgyu dbyings dang 'bras bu ye shes
NK101(de)003:399: can // des na bde chen kyang tshig tsam las mtshan nyid pa dang bral bas /
NK101(de)003:400: shin tu mthar phyin ma bcos ba'i rnal mar 'byor pa min no //
NK101(de)003:401: rdo rje gling phug gi rked pa na //
NK101(de)003:402: snying po med pas chu shing gi rtsa ba na ma he mo //
NK101(de)003:403: zho skyel du 'ong yang snying po snum pa tsam
NK101(de)003:404: las med pa ltar du rang sa thob kyang mthar
NK101(de)003:405: mi phyin pa'o // rin po che gter gtad pa
NK101(de)003:406: las gnas lugs ma rtogs pa de ma yin la
NK101(de)003:407: der 'dzin pas 'khrul pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////dper na
NK101(de)003:408: yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal des pa
NK101(de)003:409: mi phyin pa'o // de la // rang gi bsod
NK101(de)003:410: nams kyi mthus pha yis longs spyod mi zad pa'i
NK101(de)003:411: gter chen po gtad pa ltar du /
NK101(de)003:412: drin can bla ma yis rang gi sems nyid la
NK101(de)003:413: yon tan mi zad pa'i gter gnas pa de rnyed
NK101(de)003:415: le'u dang por bshad pa'i shes bya re zhig brgyad la ni /
NK101(de)003:416: zhes pa'i grangs brgyad po de la //
NK101(de)003:417: chos nyid rtogs pa'i don la mi slu bas tshad ma gsum gyi dang po lung gis /
NK101(de)003:419: gtan tshigs gsum gyis gzhigs te dpes mtshon pa dang
NK101(de)003:420: gsum gyis spyi'i rnam pa rtogs par byas nas drod
NK101(de)003:421: dang ldan pa la bla ma rin chen gyis gdams
NK101(de)003:422: ngag snyan khung brgyud pas chos nyid rang gi mtshan
NK101(de)003:423: nyid mngon sum par bstan te //
NK101(de)003:424: blo dang skal ba zhan cing dad pa can gyi slob bu de la //
NK101(de)003:425: thabs chen brgyud pa'i lung theg pa brgyad po blo dang gang 'tsham pas brgyud nas drang ba ni /
NK101(de)003:426: rjod pa'i tshig dang brjod bya'i don mi mthun par don gzhan la dgongs pas tshig ston //
NK101(de)003:427: pa ni dper na byis pa g.yang sa las 'dren
NK101(de)003:428: pa'i phyir du stag 'ong nor bu sbyin zer ba
NK101(de)003:429: dang 'dra 'o // drang don nges don gyi khyad par ni /
NK101(de)003:430: skal ba dang ldan pa la bya bral rdzogs par ston pa'i lung gis /
NK101(de)003:431: bden cing nges par mtshon nas dngos su don la drang ba'i lung gsum ste //
NK101(de)003:432: gol sa brjod bya gnas lugs sems kyi de kho na nyid la brgyud nas 'jug pa drang don /
NK101(de)003:433: dngos su 'jug pa nges don yin mi gsung /
NK101(de)003:434: shan 'byed par byed pa bram ze'i gzhung dang /
NK101(de)003:435: rang gzhung la zlo ba rgyal po'i rgyud dang /
NK101(de)003:436: rang grol mngon sum par ston pa man ngag gi
NK101(de)003:437: rgyud dang gsum gyi tshig gis yid ches par bya
NK101(de)003:438: // rig pa rang gsal ba ngang dang rang bzhin
NK101(de)003:439: rig pa cir yang snang ba dang bdag nyid chen
NK101(de)003:440: po snang stong tha dad med pa'o //
NK101(de)003:441: sna tshogs su snang yang gnas lugs las ma g.yos
NK101(de)003:442: par mtshon pa ni ngang gi gtan tshigs nyid yin
NK101(de)003:443: de // mu mtha' cir yang snang bas don chos nyid cir yang grub pa min te /
NK101(de)003:444: mu matha'i phyogs gcig tu grub pa min pas mu
NK101(de)003:445: mtha' phyogs gcig tu snang ba yang ma nges te
NK101(de)003:446: rig pa mthas ma bsgribs par gsal ba'o //
NK101(de)003:447: chos nyid ma nor bcos med rang ga bzhin gyi gtan tshigs ni //
NK101(de)003:448: phyi yul du grub pa min nang rig pa tu rgya ma chad //
NK101(de)003:449: yul shes gnyis nang nas sems las skye ba min te rang snang nyid ka yin pa'i phyir /
NK101(de)003:450: ngo bo ye shes nyid rgyu rkyen med par rang snang ba yin bas //
NK101(de)003:451: phyi gzung kha ba'i yul mi spong nang 'dzin pa'i sems mi 'gegs //
NK101(de)003:452: rig pa'i ye shes nyid rgyu la rag ma las par cir yang snang ngo //
NK101(de)003:453: bdag nyid chen po snang stong dbyer med kyi gtan tshigs ni //
NK101(de)003:454: snang ba bde ba chen po rtsol ba med pa dang /
NK101(de)003:455: yul med cing rang rig pa ngos gzung las 'das pa'i stong pa gnyis tha dad med pa'o //
NK101(de)003:456: chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems thig le nyag gcig tu shes pa la //
NK101(de)003:457: de las gzhan du snang ba dang bzang ngan gyi rtog pa thams cad dang bral bas na /
NK101(de)003:458: de la tha snyad du bdag nyid chen po gcig ces btags so //
NK101(de)003:459: yul du snang ba rnams ni chu nyid rlabs su
NK101(de)003:460: snang ba ltar rang snang ba'i yul dbyings nyid dag
NK101(de)003:462: de las yul can rig pa mi rtog pa'i ye shes nyid 'bras bur shar //
NK101(de)003:463: dbyings rgyu ye shes 'bras gnyis mtshan nyid mi gnyis
NK101(de)003:464: te gcig tu 'dus pas gzung 'dzin gyi mthar las
NK101(de)003:465: rang grol // gzung 'dzin ma spangs thig le nyag
NK101(de)003:466: gcig ma bsgrubs par gtan tshigs brten te bltas pas
NK101(de)003:467: don chos nyid dang mjal lo //
NK101(de)003:468: dper na blo 'khrul pa la thag pa sbrul du snang ba yang ka chos can /
NK101(de)003:469: he tuhthaga ga pa'i mtshan nyid sbrul min pas //
NK101(de)003:470: kha sbrul 'dzin du skyes pa'i shes pa bden pa
NK101(de)003:471: min te dam bca' 'dir yang de bzhin du skye
NK101(de)003:472: lugs gsum du snang yang bden pa min no //
NK101(de)003:473: yon tan cha re gnas lugs dang mthun pa'i dpe
NK101(de)003:474: ni nam mkha' dang rin rgyan dang chen dang rgya
NK101(de)003:476: don dang gnyis phyogs kyi ldog cha 'ga' res kun
NK101(de)003:477: kyang mthun te phyogs ris med pa dang mi rtog
NK101(de)003:478: la re ba skong ba la sogs pa'o //
NK101(de)003:479: lung gtan dpe kun kyang don spyi'i rnam pa tsam
NK101(de)003:480: la rtogs par byed pas shes byed du gnas so
NK101(de)003:481: // chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid rang rig pas //
NK101(de)003:482: rin chen brgyud pas mngon sum par shes pa'i thabs ni gang zhe na /
NK101(de)003:483: dbang rgyud man ngag grub pa'i chu bo bzhi'i rgyun ma chad pa'i bla ma dam pa des //
NK101(de)003:484: rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob pa'i sras a ti'i skal ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma la //
NK101(de)003:485: kun gzhi bag chags rnam par byang bar gnas pa
NK101(de)003:486: de tshogs bdun dang lhan du ldan pas chags dang
NK101(de)003:487: gcig tu bsres pa'i sbyor don la /
NK101(de)003:488: rtogs pa'i gdeng chen po thug phrad gsum gyis thig le nyag gcig tu bstan no //
NK101(de)003:489: mkhar chen po gcig la sgo brgyad yod pa'i dbang po lnga'i sgo'i phyi na //
NK101(de)003:490: dbang po yul ston gyi bu mo gzugs sgra dri ro reg lnga ni /
NK101(de)003:491: 'dod pa'i yon tan sdug 1snyan 2zhim 3bro 4'jam 5lnga bsnams nas cha lugs mdzes mas de la stob //
NK101(de)003:492: sgo de'i nang na sgo srung rnam shes lnga po la //
NK101(de)003:493: re re la'ang bu sems las byung ba bzhi bzhi yod pa'i phu bo ni //
NK101(de)003:494: rtogs pa'i gdeng chen po mnga' ba'i rgyal po ma 'khrul bar tshugs na gnas pa ni /
NK101(de)003:495: snang la 'dzin pa med pas sgyu ma ma btsal bas lhun grub kyi yul la rol lo //
NK101(de)003:496: bu gnyis pa ni bram ze ltar rtog pa rtsing ba can te /
NK101(de)003:497: gtsang sme dang re dogs kyi yul la rol lo //
NK101(de)003:498: bu gsum pa ni rig byed bzo mkhan ltar dpyod pa ni shes pa zhib pa ste /
NK101(de)003:499: nyes legs dang mdzes sdug gi yul la rol //
NK101(de)003:500: bu bzhi pa ni zhal che gcod mkhan ltar tha snyad 'dogs te /
NK101(de)003:501: zhal che gcod pa tshong dus kyi yul la rol lo //
NK101(de)003:502: phu bos nu bo gsum po dbang du byas nas bsgral du btub ste /
NK101(de)003:503: nga ni tshugs na gnas pa'i rgyal po yin na //
NK101(de)003:504: nu bo khyed gsum kyang de nga bzhin pha rnam pa sgyu mar gcig pas //
NK101(de)003:505: las thabs rtogs dpyod tha snyad 'dog pa gsum la ma gnas shig nga bzhin du 'gyur ro //
NK101(de)003:506: sgo gtan mtshan mar 'dzin pa bcag ste 'khor sa phyags nas /
NK101(de)003:507: dbul ba'i dri ma sel ba'i nor bu chu 'dang
NK101(de)003:508: blangs nas longs spyad de bzo las byas pa'i rgyal
NK101(de)003:509: mtshan btsugs so // sgo lnga'i yul lnga rnams rgyal po snang la mi rtog pa'i mnga' ru bzhes //
NK101(de)003:510: te de las gzhan pa'i 'bangs med pas rgyal po'i tha snyad kyang grol lo //
NK101(de)003:511: sems med pa des na thig le nyag gcig go /
NK101(de)003:512: gcig ni phyi sgo lnga dang nang nyon yid gnyis kyi bar sgo yid kyi dbang po phyi //
NK101(de)003:513: ma 'ongs lung ston dang 'das pa gleng slong gi /
NK101(de)003:514: bu mo gnyis skad tshangs pa'i dbyangs ltar snyan pa gtan rgyud tshangs chen ltar mkhas //
NK101(de)003:515: pa gnyis kyis yid 'phrog nas bya ba mang po la shor //
NK101(de)003:516: sgo'i nang na sgo srung yid kyi rnam shes bya ba mang po bya ba yod //
NK101(de)003:517: de la bu gsum yod pa'i chen po ni //
NK101(de)003:518: sngar byas pa thams cad don med ces bya bu chung ba ni //
NK101(de)003:519: phyis byed pa zin med ces bya bu bar pa ni //
NK101(de)003:520: gdeng chen rtsod pa mi byed pas 'dzangs pa bar na yod pas gzung bor gnas so //
NK101(de)003:521: bu chen po ni don med thang chad kyi yul la rol //
NK101(de)003:522: bu chung ba ni zin med sgyid lug gi yul la rol //
NK101(de)003:523: bar pa ni 'od gsal gyi dgon par rol //
NK101(de)003:524: bu che chung gnyis bu mo gnyis kyis gtam rgyud dag la ma mthun te rtsod //
NK101(de)003:525: bu bar pas gong 'og gnyis thabs kyis dbang du byas te bsgral //
NK101(de)003:526: ngas ni gtam rgyud la bsams pa med //
NK101(de)003:527: bya ba mang la zin pa nyung don chung la nyes pa mang bas /
NK101(de)003:528: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu bya ba zhog la 'od gsal gyi dgon par 'dong //
NK101(de)003:529: khyed gnyis kyang nga bzhin du bde ba 'dod pa gcig ces pas drangs te /
NK101(de)003:530: 'dzangs pa zhi dal can gyis ri rgod klungs su phab ste //
NK101(de)003:531: rtsod pa med pas bar pa gzu bo'i tha snyad kyang rang grol lo //
NK101(de)003:532: yid gcig ni kha nang du kun gzhi la bstan pa'i sgo dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i 'gram na //
NK101(de)003:533: srin po stobs chen nyon yid las byung bas bu spun dug lnga ni /
NK101(de)003:534: rno zhing 'jug pas rang la rang gsod pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs nas //
NK101(de)003:535: rang la shed skyed cing nus pa'i mthu stobs dang ldan par byed //
NK101(de)003:536: sgo de'i nang na sgo srung sdig can spyi la rang du dmigs pa bya ba de la //
NK101(de)003:537: bu nyon mongs pa lnga dang stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yod /
NK101(de)003:538: de rnams 'dus pa'i tha chungs mthar thug tha ma ni //
NK101(de)003:539: gdeng chen po mnga' ba'i dpa' bo nyon mongs pa'i g.yul 'joms bya ba gnas //
NK101(de)003:540: phu bo rnams ni na rag dmyal ba'i yul na yod /
NK101(de)003:541: tha chungs rang rig bde chen dgos pa 'byung ba'i rin chen gyi gling na yod //
NK101(de)003:542: chung bas gcen po rnams thabs kyi dbang du byas nas bsgral du btub pa ni /
NK101(de)003:543: 'u cag kun kyang dpa' bor mtha' thug pas na /
NK101(de)003:544: nga nyid la nyon mongs pa kun gyi stobs rdzogs na //
NK101(de)003:545: shed cher skyed cig nus pa'i stobs dang rno mtshon kun gyis /
NK101(de)003:546: rang la rang gis 'joms pa ma brlag gam //
NK101(de)003:547: de bas yul ngan pa na rag rten de bor la //
NK101(de)003:548: bde chen rin chen gyi gling du 'dod zhes bya ste //
NK101(de)003:549: thams cad dpa' bo chen por gyur pas mi mthun
NK101(de)003:550: pa med de dpa' bo'i tha snyad kyang rang grol
NK101(de)003:551: lo // 'khrul gzhi thig le nyag gcig la skye
NK101(de)003:552: lugs gsum byung nas tshogs bdun gyis rgyud dkrugs pas
NK101(de)003:553: gzhi don dwang ba'i rgya mtsho bag chags kyi rnyog
NK101(de)003:555: nor bu ka sprul chu 'dang gis nor bu kha
NK101(de)003:556: chos bkra shis kyis rin ga longs chen dbang gi
NK101(de)003:557: rgyal pos / rnyog ka pa sangs 'o kha ma'i
NK101(de)003:558: rgya mtsho byas bdud ga rtsi'i rgya mtshor gyur pa
NK101(de)003:559: rgyal pos / ltar du // tshogs bdun la thug
NK101(de)003:560: phrad gsum gyis byang chub kyi sems thig le nyag
NK101(de)003:561: rgyal pos / ltar du // gcig mthong bas //
NK101(de)003:562: bag chags kyi rten sbyor ba don gyi kun gzhi
NK101(de)003:564: tha snyad du ma bcos pa dang lhun grub dang rang gsal ba zhes btags pa'ang /
NK101(de)003:565: dgos pa'i dbang gis btags pa yin gyi don thun min pas sgra ji bzhin pa min no //
NK101(de)003:566: 'khrul pa rnams byang chub kyi sems su ngo shes //
NK101(de)003:567: pas de las gzhan pa'i sel med pa ni dper
NK101(de)003:568: na rin chen gyi gling na rdo'i sel med pa
NK101(de)003:569: bzhin no // chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid rang rig pa'i mngon sum du rang rig na //
NK101(de)003:570: pha bla ma la drin du bzo bas brtse zhing mched grogs la gdung sems che /
NK101(de)003:571: ma rtogs pa'i 'khrul ba la snying brtse bas phan pa'i sems dang ldan //
NK101(de)003:572: dam tshig la rub cing don la rton te nyams su len /
NK101(de)003:573: phyi nang gi dngos po la zhen pa mi brtan dgra gnyen la sogs pa'i gtad 'dzin chung //
NK101(de)003:574: nang na rtogs pa'i gdeng dang ldan pas 'bras bu
NK101(de)003:575: thob tu re ba dang ma thob tu dogs pa
NK101(de)003:576: med // don gnas lugs mtshon par byed pa'i tshig la yin min gyi yangs dog med //
NK101(de)003:577: gang ltar spyad kyang mi 'ching bas spyod lam yangs
NK101(de)003:578: la grub mtha' la sogs pa gang gi 'ang phyogs
NK101(de)003:579: 'dzin chung ngo // nges par rtogs te gdeng du gyur pa na //
NK101(de)003:580: las kyi skye rkang chogs pas ngan par 'gro ba
NK101(de)003:581: gsum gyi sdug bsngal las grol phyogs med kyi don
NK101(de)003:582: rtogs pas theg pa dman pa las khyad par du
NK101(de)003:583: 'phags // ci spyod don las mi nyams pas rgyal ba sangs rgyas nyid dang spyod yul gcig /
NK101(de)003:584: thun mong tha mal gyi sdig pa'i rnam smin sdug bsngal med //
NK101(de)003:585: yon tan grangs kyi mtha' 'ang med pas rgyal bas kyang brjod las 'das so //
NK101(de)003:586: lta ba 'di med na 'og ma bas don la rtsol bas ji ltar 'bad cing brtsal kyang //
NK101(de)003:587: mthar thug gi 'bras bu'i sa la gnas pa min te //
NK101(de)003:588: 'bras bu gong mar skye zhing rang gi 'bras bu
NK101(de)003:589: 'jig pa dang bcas pas 'khor bar rgyud las bshad
NK101(de)003:590: // dper na nor bu 'ching bu rgyal mtshan gyi
NK101(de)003:591: rtser 'dogs kyang dgos pa mi 'byung ba dang 'dra
NK101(de)003:592: // ste // rang sa'i 'dod pa don du gnyen
NK101(de)003:593: ba tsam las mthar ming phyin pas dmar thag las
NK101(de)003:594: // ste // pa ni / le'u'i gnyis par bshad
NK101(de)003:595: pa'i ma he'i zho snying po snum pa de bzhin
NK101(de)003:596: // ste // pa ni / tsam mo // theg
NK101(de)003:597: pa gzhan gyis mthar mi phyin pa'i skyon yod pa
NK101(de)003:598: de bas na rnal ma'i don 'di rtogs pas don
NK101(de)003:599: kun mthar thug par rdzogs ye shes gsang ba'i zhes
NK101(de)003:600: // ste // pa ni / tsam mo // drang
NK101(de)003:601: / rgya mtsho chen po dang gser gyi 'og gzhi'i
NK101(de)003:602: steng na kun rdzogs pa dang 'dra //
NK101(de)003:603: phyogs kun nas mthun par mtshon pa'i dpe las 'das pa ni /
NK101(de)003:604: dmus long la mar gyi mdog mtshon du mi btub pa dang 'dra'o //
NK101(de)003:605: mu matha'i phyogs su 'di kho na yin ces tshig tu brjod pa'i tha snyad dang bral ba ni /
NK101(de)003:606: khams gsum gyi dang po 'dod pa'i khams kyi las kyi mtha' nyams su myong ba dang 'dra //
NK101(de)003:607: chos thams cad ma nor bar chos nyid rang snang yin ba ni /
NK101(de)003:608: chu'i rlabs thams cad rgya mtshor ro gcig pa bzhin no //
NK101(de)003:609: rtogs pa'i lta ba gsal na che ba'i yon tan shugs la 'char ba ni /
NK101(de)003:610: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas pa dang 'dra //
NK101(de)003:611: skyon yon yod pa des na skal ba dang ldan pas rang gi gter long zhig /
NK101(de)003:612: ma dad pa dang le lo dang yid gnyis the tshom kyis //
NK101(de)003:613: dgos pa'i don grub pa 'jig rten gyi khams na 'ga' tsam yang med //
NK101(de)003:614: tsha reg dang grang reg thang cig 'dres par spyad pas //
NK101(de)003:615: 'bras bu gtso bsreg gi las grub pa 'ga' tsam
NK101(de)003:616: yang mthong ngam ci des na de dag spongs shing
NK101(de)003:617: par gdams pa'o // rin po che gter gtad pa
NK101(de)003:618: las rtogs pa lta ba'i thabs dang ngo bo la
NK101(de)003:619: sogs pa'i don gsal bar bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum
NK101(de)003:620: pa'o////le'u gsum par bshad pa'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi
NK101(de)003:621: bsod nams kyis pha'i gter chen po gtad pa ltar
NK101(de)003:622: par gdams pa'o // du / lta ba rtogs pa'i
NK101(de)003:623: don la 'dris shing goms pas 'bras bu mthar dbyung
NK101(de)003:624: ba'i thabs ni gang zhe na //
NK101(de)003:625: 'og ma pa rtogs pa'i don mu bzhi phyogs ltung gi 'dod pa dang bcas pa ni /
NK101(de)003:626: yongs chod bsgrub bya'i lta ba de ma yin las ldog pa'i sa rnam chod can la /
NK101(de)003:627: dmigs pa gtad nas de las ma yengs par goms pa'i rgyu las //
NK101(de)003:628: rang la sngar med kyi 'bras bu dus phyis 'byung
NK101(de)003:629: bar 'dod pa las grol ba ni gang zhe na
NK101(de)003:630: // rdo rje gling phug gong na gzhan med pas rtse mo na //
NK101(de)003:631: shing tsa na ka'i sdong po'i rtsa ba na'i sa
NK101(de)003:632: la gnas pa la dbang che bar 'dzin pa'i seng
NK101(de)003:633: ge ma de / stobs che ngar skad drag khro gnyer dang ldan pa de thabs kyis bsten nas //
NK101(de)003:634: gser gyi zo bar 'o ma bzhos nas bcud du gyur pa de len pa ltar du //
NK101(de)003:635: rtogs par bya ba'i don thig le nyag gcig yin pas //
NK101(de)003:636: tshogs bdun rnams thig le nyag gcig tu thug phrad gsum gyis dgrol //
NK101(de)003:637: don dang mi mthun pa'i rnam rtog thams cad byang
NK101(de)003:638: chub kyi sems su kar nas dag pa yin la
NK101(de)003:639: // de ltar rtogs pas ched du ma gtad pa'i
NK101(de)003:640: don gyis 0dus nam yang de dang 'bral ba'ang med
NK101(de)003:641: // 1pas / gtad nas bsgom 0du med kyang mi
NK101(de)003:642: 'bral bas na sgom 1 pa'i gzer chen po yin
NK101(de)003:643: // 1pas / no // rtogs pa'i don dran pa rkyen gyi man ngag gis //
NK101(de)003:644: ye nas yin pa'i don rtogs pa'i so ma 'das pa tsam la sgom zhes bya'o //
NK101(de)003:645: gser la gser 'gyur gyi rtsi mi sten pa ltar
NK101(de)003:646: du ye nas sangs rgyas pa la rtsol bas mi
NK101(de)003:647: sgrub par / mngon sum par de yin par bdag
NK101(de)003:648: nyid chen por chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas pa'i
NK101(de)003:649: che ba dang bzhis brda don phrad pa dang lnga'i
NK101(de)003:650: tha ma sangs rgyas med pa'i che bas nges par
NK101(de)003:652: brda bral rang grol du rtogs pa'i gdeng chen po
NK101(de)003:653: dang ldan pa'i skyes bu'i lta ba la zhe 'dod
NK101(de)003:655: dper na khyung chen nam mkha' la ldings pa la rjes med pa lta bu'o //
NK101(de)003:656: rtogs pa de la yang blo gros kache khachunga gi bye brag yod de /
NK101(de)003:657: rang bzhin gyi rigs kha shes pa'i rgyud dbang po chig chod du ma ldan pas //
NK101(de)003:658: rtogs pa'i gdeng chen pos grol ba tshad la ma phebs na //
NK101(de)003:659: ting nge la gnas par bya dgos te /
NK101(de)003:660: nyams kyi rim pa'ang dang po /
NK101(de)003:661: gnas pa gnyis pa mi g.yo ba gsum pa mnyam pa nyid dang rim par sbyar nas /
NK101(de)003:662: tha ma ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i nyams la
NK101(de)003:663: gnas na sangs rgyas kyi zag med kyi bde ba
NK101(de)003:665: ting nge 'dzin la blo gnas pa'i thabs la yang sprul pa'i sku la bsam yas yod pas //
NK101(de)003:666: sgo lnga yul la mtshan mar 'dzin pa la bzhi
NK101(de)003:667: ldan pa'i dang po bzhi cha rang gsal gyis rtog
NK101(de)003:668: dpyod tha snyad 'dogs pa gsum bsgral te /
NK101(de)003:669: yul lngar snang ba tsam mi dgag par de la zhen par mi bya'o //
NK101(de)003:670: de yang ngal gso dbugs phyung bas legs pa tsam
NK101(de)003:671: las spros bral dang rang rig gi dmar thag ma
NK101(de)003:673: dpa' bo nyon mongs pa rno 'jug gi mtshon cha
NK101(de)003:674: thogs pa des 'khor bar 'dzin pas lcags kyu dug
NK101(de)003:675: lnga // po bdag gi ma spangs par longs spyod
NK101(de)003:676: pas mthar thug pa'i dus na rang la gnyen por
NK101(de)003:677: lnga // bzlog / nga bdag dang gzung 'dzin mi
NK101(de)003:678: spang par rang rig tu shes pas rang grol du
NK101(de)003:680: bdud kyi dpung gi dgra choms nas dgra nyid gnyen du 'jug pa dang 'dra'o //
NK101(de)003:681: smra ba gtam rgyud mkhan gyi bu mo gnyis thabs kyis spros bral du sbyar ba ni /
NK101(de)003:682: bya ba mang la zin pa nyung bas bya ba zhog ces zhor la she gcad //
NK101(de)003:683: 'dzangs pa bar pas yul spros bral du bcad pa'i ngag don mnyan //
NK101(de)003:684: snga phyi'i rtog pa sna tshogs kyi gras thag dus der rgyun 'chad la //
NK101(de)003:685: yid kyi yul du snang ba rnams rang sar thabs des grol bar 'gyur ro //
NK101(de)003:686: ting nge la 'jug pa sla la gtang ba dka'
NK101(de)003:687: rang gi ngo bo bde la gsal zhing mi rtog
NK101(de)003:688: pa'o // nyams kyi don gyi rnam grangs pra khrid
NK101(de)003:689: nyams rim bzhi par re re la ngo bo dpe
NK101(de)003:691: 'khrul pa'i rkyen shugs kyi tshogs bdun skye lugs gsum
NK101(de)003:692: du shar ba de sems nyid thig le nyag gcig
NK101(de)003:693: tu dgrol lo // rtogs pa'i ka gdeng chen po
NK101(de)003:694: tshad dang ldan pas rtogs grol chig chod du nar
NK101(de)003:697: 0che long dang zhib 00mo'i bye brag gis //
NK101(de)003:698: dus nam du yang rtogs pa rang gi so las mi 'da' na //
NK101(de)003:699: sems gnas pa'i thabs dang ting nge'i skyon bcos pa'i thabs la ched du ci la che //
NK101(de)003:700: sems bsam gtan la gnas pas lhag lus rdo rje'i
NK101(de)003:701: skyil krung ngag rdo rje'i bzlas pa ste lhag pa'i
NK101(de)003:702: rtags dang ldan pa'i lha'i bu bzhin du /
NK101(de)003:703: sprul sku las yang sprul pa'i gsang bdag gi thugs
NK101(de)003:704: kyi sras ngas sku gsum gyi dgongs pa thugs kyi
NK101(de)003:705: bcud 'thungs pas / ma he'i zho'i bcud kyang rdo rje bcud dur chags so //
NK101(de)003:706: blo che ba de las gzhan du blo chung bas ji ltar yin pa'i don nges par mthong yang //
NK101(de)003:707: 'khrul pa la thog ma med pa nas goms pa'i bag chags stug pos bsgribs pa la /
NK101(de)003:708: lta ba mthong ba'i don blo la 'dris pas bag chags kyi rnyog gzhi sbyor don sangs pas /
NK101(de)003:709: gzhi don gyi kun gzhi rnam par byang ba'i yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir sgom dgos so //
NK101(de)003:710: de ltar bag chags kyi rnyog pa med pa'i ngang du 'dris na //
NK101(de)003:711: ngar 'dzin 1dang phyogs cha1 dang zhen pa nub //
NK101(de)003:712: blang dor 1 gyi rtsing chos kyi dregs pa'i spyod pa dang bral //
NK101(de)003:713: rtogs pa'i gdeng dang ldan snang la rang bzhin med pa'i sgyu mar snang ba'i ngang du 'dris pas //
NK101(de)003:714: tha snyad la brjed ngas phyi nang gi dngos po la chags pa chung //
NK101(de)003:715: 'khrul la ya mtshan 1skye bas sems can la thugs brtse 0bas //
NK101(de)003:717: phyi lus la snang ba nang dbugs la snang ste
NK101(de)003:718: rang gis myong bas drod 1gzhan la snang ba'i rtags
NK101(de)003:720: gsang sngags gces pa'i mdzod mi zad pas gter gyi bdag po nyid kyis rgyud du gsungs so //
NK101(de)003:721: gnas lugs ming tsam 'di zhes mtshon par ni /
NK101(de)003:722: rdo rje sems dpas yong ma gsungs //
NK101(de)003:723: zhes nam mkha' che las so //
NK101(de)003:724: ming gis mtshon pa la mi gnas 0shing //
NK101(de)003:725: rtogs don de ma yin pa'i ldog pa las grol 00bas //
NK101(de)003:726: dgongs pa'i ngo bo rang gis rang la dris00 //
NK101(de)003:727: brda 0 don rgyud pa'i bla ma than pas don ci zhig mtshon pa'i tshig smra //
NK101(de)003:728: de las gzhan du ji skad brjod dang don dang mi 'gal bar mtshungs //
NK101(de)003:729: rang la rang gis shog cig bu zhes gdams so //
NK101(de)003:730: de ltar le lo dang 'dzin rten gyi g.yeng ba spangs nas //
NK101(de)003:731: dmigs pa'i yul du ma gtad pa'i ngang la dus rtag tu gnas na //
NK101(de)003:732: bskal pa grangs med pa nas bsags pa yi //
NK101(de)003:733: sdig pa dang sgrib pa'i mun pa'i bag chags kyi rnyog pa sangs //
NK101(de)003:734: rnam byang gi rgya mtsho dwangs pa las //
NK101(de)003:735: yid la bsams pa sbyin gyi yon tan mi zad pa'i gter rang 'char ro //
NK101(de)003:736: bdag nyid bde ba chen pos 'gro ba yi //
NK101(de)003:737: bde bas dbul ba sel ba zhar la 'char ba
NK101(de)003:738: ni 'bras 'khar ma lo legs na phub sog zhor
NK101(de)003:739: la 'byung ba'o // yon tan las gzhan du ma
NK101(de)003:740: bsgoms pa'i skyon kyang yon tan de las bzlog pa
NK101(de)003:741: dang mtshungs te gong dang sbyar ro //
NK101(de)003:742: zhen drug gi sdug bsngal dang theg brgyad kyi rtsol ba'i nad kyis gdungs //
NK101(de)003:743: 'bras bu nas sran gro 'bras til nyungs drug rtsal rdzogs par smin kyang ma bsdus 1pa'i dpe dang /
NK101(de)003:744: rtogs nas ma goms pa'i don 'dir de 1dang 'dra'o //
NK101(de)003:745: rgyal po la sras gcig yod pa de srin pos bzung na /
NK101(de)003:746: rgyal bu yin nges par mthong yang rgyal po'i gdung mi zin pa dang 'dra'o //
NK101(de)003:747: skyon des na rtogs pa'i ngang la ma yengs par goms pa gces so //
NK101(de)003:748: thabs kun kyi rgyal po snyan khung brgyud pa'i gdams ngag rin chen gyis //
NK101(de)003:749: rgyal dwa bu rgyal sar bton pas rgyal po chen por mngon sum du grub pa ltar sbyar ro //
NK101(de)003:750: dran rtog rig pa'i rlung gis g.yengs nas rtogs pas 'phyar te blo mi gnas na //
NK101(de)003:751: g.yo 'dzin rlung gi man ngag gzung ba la sogs pa sbyin te /
NK101(de)003:752: lus dang sems klong la ye shes rlung gi gzer chen po gdab //
NK101(de)003:753: zhor la 'byung bas thun mong ste tshe ring ba
NK101(de)003:754: la sogs pa dang mchog gi dngos grub rdzogs so
NK101(de)003:755: // khams gsum gyi dang po 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'dod chags kyi shas drag bas /
NK101(de)003:756: mtshan ma chags pa'i spros pa 'chel nas de la zhen te mi gnas pa la //
NK101(de)003:757: bde ba thig le 'og sgo khams gsum rol pa'i man ngag bstan no //
NK101(de)003:758: mdor na thabs gang la brten nas skyes kyang ting 'dzin gyi mchog yin te /
NK101(de)003:760: dper na lha yi zhes drang /
NK101(de)003:761: brda dang bral ba'i rgyal bu rgyal sar dbang bskur ba dang 'dra'o //
NK101(de)003:762: rtogs pa de yang dang por dbang bskur ba las shes //
NK101(de)003:763: de'i rten1 ga1zhi 2dkyil 'khor dang dam 2tshig gnyis ldan //
NK101(de)003:764: de'i rkyen gyi rim pa phrin las dang ldan par rdzogs //
NK101(de)003:766: de dag ces drang rnam rtog rang grol du shar
NK101(de)003:767: ba ni lta ba rtogs pa ste dbang thob pa'i
NK101(de)003:769: nyams su blangs shing goms pas 'bras bu mthar phyin par 'gyur ro //
NK101(de)003:770: gnang ba dang bkag pa med pa'i spyod pas la bzla ba ni lta sgom gyi grogs po /
NK101(de)003:771: sa sbyangs pa dang lam bgrod med pa'i sa lam ni yon tan gyi gter ro //
NK101(de)003:772: sems las logs nas thob pa dang sgrib pa spangs
NK101(de)003:773: su med pa 'bras bu'i sel med pas klong ngo
NK101(de)003:774: // ming gis klong dgu ru btags pa la don rang snang nyag gcig tu rtogs pa ni /
NK101(de)003:775: dper na rig gnas bzo gso ba sgra gtan tshigs
NK101(de)003:776: nang rig pa ste lnga rdzogs pa'i gang zag la
NK101(de)003:777: // bzo bo dang sman pa la sogs pa'i ming
NK101(de)003:778: gang du btags kyang yon tan gyi ldog cha nas
NK101(de)003:779: brtsis pas kun kyang bden pa bzhin no //
NK101(de)003:780: gsang sngags kyi mdzod 1gter 1gyi 2'dzin 2bdag pos de nyid dgu ldan sems kyi gzhi /
NK101(de)003:782: rin po che gter gtad pa las rtogs pa'i don
NK101(de)003:783: la 'dris shing goms pa'i thabs kyis 'bras bu mthar
NK101(de)003:784: phyin par bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o////shing tsa na
NK101(de)003:785: ka'i 'bras bu ltar du rgyu rkyen med par rang
NK101(de)003:787: rang gi ngo bos ma nor bar 'khor 'das kyi
NK101(de)003:788: chos kun la khyab pa ni ngo bo nyid kyi
NK101(de)003:789: sku can // de nyid bla ma'i drin gyis ma
NK101(de)003:790: bcos par rang nyid lam gyis mthar phyin pa ni
NK101(de)003:791: sku can // chos sku / 'khor 'das kyi bde
NK101(de)003:792: ba thams cad rang rig bde ba chen por mngon
NK101(de)003:793: sum du mdzad pas ni nyid longs sku /
NK101(de)003:794: de nyid sa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ngo
NK101(de)003:795: la 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar mtshan dper
NK101(de)003:796: snang ba ni gzhan longs sku /
NK101(de)003:797: 'gro ba ris drug dang srid pa khams gsum sems
NK101(de)003:798: can thams cad kyi ngo la dag ma dag sna
NK101(de)003:799: tshogs su snang nas sbyong bar mdzad pa ni sprul
NK101(de)003:800: sku'o // chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ji bzhin
NK101(de)003:801: pa nyid du gnas pa de mngon du mdzad pa'i
NK101(de)003:802: sku'o // phyir / rang snang rig pa'i mngon sum
NK101(de)003:803: du sku bzhi po rdzogs pas ngo bo la dbyer
NK101(de)003:804: sku'o // phyir / med do // sgrib byed med
NK101(de)003:805: pas rang gsal rnam par mi rtog snang ba'i yul
NK101(de)003:806: med pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes /
NK101(de)003:807: chos thams cad chos nyid de bzhin nyid 'dir bzang
NK101(de)003:808: ngan che chung med par mnyam pa ni mnyam pa
NK101(de)003:810: mtshon tshul nas ma 'dres la ye shes kyi ngang
NK101(de)003:811: du yongs su rdzogs pas rgyal ba'i thugs kun gyi
NK101(de)003:812: bdag nyid ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes /
NK101(de)003:813: rtsol bas ma byas par bdag gzhan gyi don du
NK101(de)003:814: bya ba kun sgrub pas bya ba grub pa'i ye
NK101(de)003:815: shes / mu matha'i phyogs ris thams cad rang sar
NK101(de)003:816: grol nas thig ler rdzogs pas stong pa nyid kyi
NK101(de)003:817: shes / ye shes so // yul med rang gsal
NK101(de)003:818: thig le nyag gcig ni ye shes zhes ming du
NK101(de)003:819: gdags pa'i gzhi can yin no //
NK101(de)003:820: rang gsal ye nas ma bcos pa //
NK101(de)003:821: don de shes pas ye shes yin //
NK101(de)003:823: tshogs brgyad yul dang bcas pa thams cad byang chub
NK101(de)003:824: sems su rdzogs pas nyan spangs rang rgyal bkag sbyong
NK101(de)003:826: mngon sum par sangs rgyas te spong 'gegs sbyong ba'i
NK101(de)003:827: rtsol ba med pas bde chen de shin tu rnal
NK101(de)003:828: 'byor la rdzogs pas mtshan nyid sde gsum las che'o
NK101(de)003:829: // thig le spros bral du ro gcig pas rgyu
NK101(de)003:830: dbyings dang 'bras bu ye shes kyi mtshan nyid dang
NK101(de)003:831: // bral bas / chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas
NK101(de)003:832: te rgyu 'bras kyi rtsol ba med pas bde chen
NK101(de)003:833: de gang las che na yongs su rnal 'byor las
NK101(de)003:835: snang stong gnyis med gnyis su med pa'ang min te de dang bral bas /
NK101(de)003:836: bdag nyid chen por sangs rgyas pa ste tshul ngan
NK101(de)003:837: gyi rtsol ba med pas bde chen gang las na
NK101(de)003:839: blang ba dang dor ba dang yin min gyi phyogs cha dang bral bas /
NK101(de)003:840: dor bya de nyid blang bya de yin par sangs
NK101(de)003:841: rgyas pa ni gang las che na sems dpa''i rnal
NK101(de)003:842: 'byor las che'o // de dag thams cad ming du
NK101(de)003:843: btags pa tsam ste dgongs gzhi rmongs pa la don
NK101(de)003:845: sangs rgyas zhes bla dwags su btags pa'i tha snyad
NK101(de)003:846: rang grol ba tsam ni sangs rgyas med pa'i che
NK101(de)003:847: ba'o // rin po che gter gtad pa las ngo
NK101(de)003:848: bo sku dgongs pa ye shes khyad par du 'phags
NK101(de)003:849: pa'i che ba bstan pa'i le'i ste lnga pa'o////rang la
NK101(de)003:850: ye nas gnas pa'i gter chen po rang gis rnyed
NK101(de)003:851: ba'o // pa'i thabs 'di / gdod ma nas ma
NK101(de)003:852: bral kyang ngo ma shes pa la shes byed ni
NK101(de)003:853: ba'o // pa'i thabs 'di / / sh+aakya rigs thub
NK101(de)003:854: pa'i dbang pos drang don dgongs pa can gyi drangs
NK101(de)003:856: pa'i rgyud drag0 pa dang mos pa'i mthu zhan 1pa
NK101(de)003:858: las ngan kyis tshe thung ba dang bka' yi don
NK101(de)003:860: bstan pa snyigs pa dang grub mnga' ngan pas bsgyur ba dang drug go //
NK101(de)003:861: byams pa la sogs pa'i gnyen 0po phyogs gcig pas
NK101(de)003:862: mi non cing sgrub pa la brtson 'grus zhan pa
NK101(de)003:863: / de dag mthong nas bde ba chen po mngon sum du rtogs pa'i thabs //
NK101(de)003:864: sku gsung gyi dgongs pa thugs kyi bcud phyung ba de /
NK101(de)003:865: 'thungs pas byang chub kyi chu yis rgyud brlan //
NK101(de)003:866: smon lam btab pa'i mthu drag pos byang chub kyi myu gu smin //
NK101(de)003:867: thugs rjes gzung ba'i yul ngan pa 'gro ba drug la sems 'phrogs pas //
NK101(de)003:868: rang dang rigs rgyud mthun pa 'ga' la thugs rje'i zer spros bsam //
NK101(de)003:869: tha snyad rgyas par zer ba spangs te don du dril nas //
NK101(de)003:870: 'jam dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa nyid kyi bu la gtad //
NK101(de)003:871: khyed kyis rang dang rigs mthun pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa 'ga' 'ga' tsam la //
NK101(de)003:872: rdo rje sems dpa'i nam mkha' che //
NK101(de)003:873: rang grol ba'i gdams ngag gis skabs phye la brda sprad /
NK101(de)003:874: brda don thams cad phyogs ris las grol bar rgyas gdab cing //
NK101(de)003:875: rnam rtog gi spros pa thig le drug gis gcad //
NK101(de)003:876: che ba lngas khyad par du spags te dgrol //
NK101(de)003:877: rang gi gter chen po gtad do kye legs par chongs shig /
NK101(de)003:878: rin po che gter gtad pa mdor bsdus pa slob
NK101(de)003:879: dpon dga' rab rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa
NK101(de)003:881: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal seng ge'i 'od can dang /
NK101(de)003:882: lo ts+aa ba dge slong ga 'jag sdang rnam par
NK101(de)003:883: snang mdzad kyi zhal gzigs pas yul d+ha he na'i
NK101(de)003:884: 'du khang du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
NK101(de)003:885: pa'o // se'i ban+d+he 'byung ldan gyis rang gi rnam rtog dang mthun par mchan bu btab pa /
